nodes.text: Siric was a Male Quarren native of his planet Dac, which was occupied by the Galactic Empire during the early Galactic Civil War. An assistant to the explosives expert Cuvran, Siric assisted Rebel Alliance Captain Juno Eclipse when she traveled to Dac in 1 BBY to recruit Gial Ackbar to the Rebel Alliance and orchestrate sabotage against the Empire on the planet.
